sentences.english: We'd better get everything straight before taking any action.
sentences.chinese: 我们最好把所有相关事宜都捋顺再采取行动。

sentences.english: Iwill give you a call after I contact the Front Office about the rollaway.
sentences.chinese: 我与前厅部联系您家创的有关事宜后马上给你回电话。

sentences.english: The OCOG may establish a functional area dealing with Recruitment aspects.
sentences.chinese: 组委会可以设立专门的职能部门办理招聘有关事宜。

sentences.english: The following issues, inter alia, were considered.
sentences.chinese: 慎重考虑了以下问题及其他相关事宜。

sentences.english: Recruitment of overseas agents and distributors, detailed issues please contact us.
sentences.chinese: 诚招海外代理与经销商，详细事宜请联系我们。

sentences.english: After leaving hospital, li Mou compensates for matters concerned with inn square bargaining.
sentences.chinese: 出院后，李某就和店方交涉赔偿事宜。

sentences.english: After this statement, we will not make any response to divorce matters.
sentences.chinese: 本声明以后，我们将不会就离婚事宜再作任何回应。

sentences.english: Welcome to talk about the cooperation with us.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎新老客户来电来函洽谈合作事宜。

sentences.english: About the matters not covered in this agreement, both parties shall settle through friendly consultations.
sentences.chinese: 本协议如有未尽事宜，由甲乙双方友好协商解决。

sentences.english: To work with pertinent institutions to prepare funerals for deceased retired cadres and take charge of cadres' posthumous affairs.
sentences.chinese: 会同有关部门办理离退休干部的丧葬和善后处理事宜。

sentences.english: For the last twenty years I have repeatedly emphasized the matter of spreading the Cause of God.
sentences.chinese: 二十年来，我一再强调传播圣道之事宜。

sentences.english: I wonder if Mr. Wang could arrange a meeting with me.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道王先生可否安排与我会面事宜？

sentences.english: Anything unstated herein shall be subject to a supplementary agreement entered into both Parties.
sentences.chinese: 未尽事宜，由甲乙双方另行签订补充协议予以约定。

sentences.english: The two sides will keep close contacts and cooperation to appropriately handle the aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 双方表示将就妥善处理善后事宜保持密切联系与合作。

sentences.english: If not separate can issue to resolve.
sentences.chinese: 若有未尽事宜另行协商解决。

sentences.english: Details of the matches and ticketing options will be released soon.
sentences.chinese: 比赛详情以及于日门票预订事宜将后公布。

definition: (political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
to agree/to decide after consultation/to come to a compromise
